name: Leopold The Lich
description:
Leopold the Lich lives in his evil fortress on Donut Island, but he’s constantly bothered by the troublesome paladins who live in the castle on the other side of the island. Leopold sets out to capture their castle, without realizing that the paladins are leaving to go take HIS castle! Just as he finishes redecorating, Leopold looks outside and… the Paladins have converted his fortress into their own castle! I guess he’ll just have to try again…

Controls and instructions for how to get the game started are included in the .zip file. This game uses a prototype of a custom engine I've been working on, so it can be a little wonky at time; don't hesitate to let me know if you run into any trouble with it!
